participant_1.name: Lucas
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and warm-hearted, I value experiences over material possessions.
participant_1.background: I spend my free time training and relaxing. I am more concerned about my physical comfort than my appearance. I would travel the world if I could. I like chasing comodo lizards on a private island. My family is my everything.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and introspective, I enjoy immersing myself in different cultures through films.
participant_2.background: My favorite thing to do on the weekends is to wear my band t-shirts and relax by watching foreign films. I work at a bar. My family is small, and we don't have a lot of money. My favorite websites are pet health sites, especially ones with information on poodles. My mom teaches kindergarten and my dad is a tax assessor.

content.text: Hi, what's your favorite thing to do?
I like to watch foreign films.
Oh, cool. What kind of films?
I like anything from Europe, but I'm especially into French films.
Oh, I love French films! Have you seen "The 400 Blows"?
Yes, I have! It's one of my favorites.
Me too! It's so beautiful and sad. What other French films do you like?
I also like "La Vie en Rose" and "Amélie."
Those are both great! I love how they capture the spirit of Paris.
Me too! I'm actually planning a trip to Paris next year.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks! I'm excited to see all the places I've seen in movies.
I'm sure you'll love it. It's a beautiful city.
